divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS JUST TAKING PICTURES RANDOMLY AND DID NOT NOTICE THIS AT THE TIME.IT IS EXACTLY THE SAME ANOMOLY THAT I REPORTED ON THE NINTH.,JUST A DIFFERENT PART OF THE SKY.THE FIRST SIGHTING WAS FACING SOUTH AND THIS ONE ON THE 25TH IS FACING WEST.JUST TO REFRESH YOUR MIND ON THE SIGHTING ON THE 9TH OF JULY,THIS IS A COPY OF THAT ONE,SO YOU CAN COMPARE.THANK YOU
